questions: My app works locally but says `Bad Gateway` when I deploy?
Why am I seeing Bad Gateway?
Why did my app root didn't return a 200?
bad-gateway.answer: Did you configure the correct PORT variable? More information: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/up#port-variable

questions: Why do I see that my account needs to be verified?
How do I verify my account?
Why do I need to verify?
account-verification.answer: We have determined that your account requires additional information to use the Starter plan. Make sure to link a GitHub account and a Credit Card to pass the verification check. If you do not have a Credit Card- don't fret; we can manually verify you if you email verify (at) railway (dot) app.

questions: What regions does Railway support?
Does Railway support the EU region?
Where are the Railway servers located?
region.answer: US West but we're working on adding other regions. Follow this ticket to stay updated: https://feedback.railway.app/feature-requests/p/eu-region-support

questions: Are databases backed up?
Can I download database backups?
db-backups.answer: We backup databases every 24 hours. Currently, there's no option in the UI to download a backup but if you reach out to us, we can get one for you.

questions: Does Railway support custom domains?
Can I use custom domains?
custom-domains.answer: Yes, you can set up multiple custom domains per project and per environment! Details: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/custom-domains

questions: How do I SSH into my application?
Can I SSH into the server?
ssh.answer: That's going to be a no from me, chief. We don't support nor encourage SSH-ing into the server.

questions: Does Railway support monorepos?
Is there support for monorepos?
monorepo.answer: Not yet but it's in our roadmap. Follow this ticket to stay updated: https://feedback.railway.app/feature-requests/p/monorepo-root-directory-support

questions: Can I use Docker?
Does Railway support Docker?
Is docker compose supported?
Can I use docker compose on Railway?
docker.answer: You can use a Dockerfile with Railway but we do not support using docker-compose at this moment. Details: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/builds#dockerfiles

questions: Why can't I connect to my plugin?
I can't seem to connect to Postgres?
plugin-connection.answer: Ensure that you are using the correct connection URL. If you can't load the data panel on your plugin's dashboard  - it could be an issue on our end, be sure to reach out to the team on Discord if that is the case.

questions: Where do I submit a feature request?
feature-requests.answer: Feature requests are greatly appreciated! You can submit a feature request here: https://feedback.railway.app/

questions: What am I allowed to host on Railway?
How do I know what content is DMCA?
What can I host?
What repos are banned?
fair-use.answer: You can see our Fair Use policy to determine what you can host: https://railway.app/legal/fair-use

questions: Can I change my account email?
How do I change my account email?
account-email.answer: Yes, you will need to contact us directly to do so. Reach out to us at contact (at) railway (dot) app

questions: Does Railway restart their servers?
Will Railway restart my application?
server-restart.answer: No, we don't restart your server on your behalf without ample warning.

questions: Can you un-ban my account?
I was banned, unban me.
Help I was banned.
Why does it say 'end of the line'?
un-ban.answer: No, we do not review disciplinary actions on our platform.

questions: How do I configure Two-Factor Authentication?
Do you have Two-Factor auth?
Where can I set up 2FA?
two-factor.answer: You can! You can set up a TOTP tool under your Account Security page: https://railway.app/account/security

questions: I am reaching my free plan limits. How do I upgrade my account?
How do I subscribe to the paid tier?
Where do I upgrade my account?
How do I add a credit card?
free-plan-limits.answer: You can upgrade on your Account Management portal under the Billing tab: https://railway.app/account/billing

questions: How does Railway calculate usage?
usage-calc.answer: We calculate RAM and CPU usage to the minute. Our rates are $0.000231 / GB / minute for RAM and $0.000463 / vCPU / minute for compute.

questions: What are the usage limits for the free plan?
Free plan limits?
free-plan.answer: Deploys on the free plan get 512 MB memory and 1GB of disk. For additional details, please visit: https://railway.app/pricing

questions: What happens when I run out of credits?
no-credits.answer: If you are on the Starter plan, your projects are put to rest until next month's credits. If you are on the Developer plan, you are charged for any usage above $10 for the month.

questions: How do I see my project's usage?
see-usage.answer: Under the project usage tab under the Account dropdown menu. We also have a link for you here: https://railway.app/account/billing

questions: I found a bug. Where can I report it?
Where do I report a bug?
bug-reporting.answer: Bug reports are happily accepted, you can report bugs at this link: https://feedback.railway.app/bug-reports

questions: Is Railway hiring?
Do you have any jobs?
Who is Percy?
What does Percy do?
Why does Percy exist?
intro.answer: Percy is Railway's helpful Discord bot!
